豘字的基本解释

豘
tún
古同“豚”。

豘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tún］
［《廣韻》徒渾切，平魂，定。］
亦作“逐3”。亦作“豘1”。
小猪。亦泛指猪。
[②]［dūn］
［《字彙補》都昆切］
通“墩1”。
[③]［dùn］
［《集韻》杜本切，上混，定。］
(1)通“遯”。隐遁。
(2)见“豚3豚”。

豘字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【豕字部】　豘； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1194第17
【集韻】同豚。本作?。或作㹠。通作肫。【字彙補】譌作豘，非。

豘字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
豘字的起名意思

暂无。

豘
Basic explanation of words
豘
tún
The ancient same "dolphin"
豘
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tún］
["Guangyun" is full of excitement, calm soul, set. ]
Also called "by 3". Also known as "豘1".
piggy. Also refers to pigs in general.
[②]［dūn］
[Du Kunqie in "The Complement of Words"]
Pass "Tun 1".
[③]［dùn］
["Ji Yun" Du Benqie, mixed up, set. ]
(1) Through "Escape". Reclusive.
(2) See "Dolphin 3 Dolphin".
豘
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Unitary Collection] [Wu Character Department] 　豘; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 1194 Page 17
【Jiyun】Same as dolphin. This work?. Or make 㹠. Pass for gizzards. 【Word Supplement】Zhao Zuo Zang, non.
